site_name: 15 Charlesworth House, 48 Stanhope Gardens, LONDON, SW7 5RD
description: Creation of new storage cupboard with jib door over Guest WC (Cloak Room), replacement of lighting and power sockets, creation of enlarged joinery unit in living room, replacement doors between living room /dining room & to kitchen, existing timber frame and glazed panel door within lobby area/Room 1 to be removed and replaced with partition walls with a lower arch above existing steps & Two nos. of bottom sashes of existing windows are proposed to be fixed in place, and  glass to be replaced with new toughened glass for health and safety reasons, both windows are facing the internal communal area.
